author: North Rhine-Westphalian Library Service Center (hbz)

resources.description: MARC-XML dump of the hbz ZVDD (aka ['digitalisiertedrucke'](http://www.digitalisiertedrucke.de/)). You can transform the data into LOD using the open source [Culturegraph Metafacture](https://github.com/culturegraph) software. For mappings, config files, and instructions on how to use the transformation software, see our [GitHub repo](https://github.com/lobid/lodmill/tree/master/lodmill-rd/transformations/zvdd).
resources.name: hbz_zvdd_resource_marc.xml.bz2

resources.description: This is a list in RDF turtle, providing the collections name and the creator of the collections which were missing in the OAI-dump, we thus provided them here in RDF turtle.
resources.name: hbz-zvdd-missing_collection_description.ttl

resources.description: This is a list in RDF Ntriples, providing the name and the creator of the collections contained in the dump.
resources.name: zvdd-collection-creator.nt

organization.description:
This group comprises open bibliographic datasets according to the [Principles on Open Bibliographic Data](http://openbiblio.net/principles) and a few not yet really open bibliographic datasets.

It is maintained by members of the [OKFN Working Group on Open Bibliographic Data](http://openbiblio.net/).
organization.title: Bibliographic Data
organization.name: bibliographic

name: hbz-zvdd
notes: Providing a MARC-XML dump of the hbz ZVDD (aka ['digitalisiertedrucke'](http://www.digitalisiertedrucke.de/)). You can transform the data into LOD using the open source [Culturegraph Metafacture](https://github.com/culturegraph) software. For mappings, config files, and instructions on how to use the transformation software, see our [GitHub repo](https://github.com/lobid/lodmill/tree/master/lodmill-rd/transformations/zvdd).
title: hbz ZVDD "www.digitalisiertedrucke.de"
